# Recent Improvements 

## Snapshot Hunter Feature

- **New Command-Line Interface**: Added `--snapshots` flag to collect snapshots from all platforms without requiring a browser
- **Multi-Platform Support**: Enhanced ability to collect snapshots from Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, and GCP simultaneously
- **Improved Data Handling**: Better handling of snapshot data with proper error checking and detailed logging
- **Test Data Support**: Added sample data for testing and demonstrations without requiring cloud connections

## Kubernetes Integration

- **Better CRD Detection**: Improved handling of Custom Resource Definitions with more detailed error messaging
- **Enhanced Volume Snapshot Support**: Added state tracking for volume snapshots (Creating, Ready, Pending)
- **More Robust API Error Handling**: Gracefully handle missing CRDs instead of crashing

## Cloud Platform Enhancements

- **AWS Integration**:
  - Added support for collecting EBS and RDS snapshots in a single command
  - Improved error handling for AWS credential issues

- **Azure Integration**: 
  - Enhanced Azure disk snapshot collection
  - Improved error messaging for subscription-related issues

- **GCP Integration**:
  - Added support for collecting disk snapshots
  - Better project detection and handling

## UI Improvements

- **Platform Selection Logic**: Improved UI for selecting which platforms to collect snapshots from
  - Added mutual exclusion for platform selection (radio button-like behavior)
  - Added "All Platforms" option for collecting data from all connected platforms

- **Enhanced Error Feedback**: Better visual indicators and messages when snapshot collection encounters problems
  - Added warning messages when platforms aren't connected
  - Improved error messages with more actionable information

- **Loading Indicators**: Added proper loading state management during snapshot collection

## Backend Improvements

- **Unified Data Structure**: Consistent formatting of snapshot data across all platforms
- **Better Error Handling**: More robust error recovery in snapshot collection
- **Detailed Logging**: Added comprehensive logging of snapshot collection operations
- **Credential Checking**: Added API endpoint to check platform credentials before attempting to collect data

## Documentation

- **Updated README**: Enhanced documentation for the Snapshot Hunter feature
- **Usage Examples**: Added examples showing how to use the feature from command line and browser
